org.waarp.common.lru

Class SynchronizedLruCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.lru.AbstractLruCache<K,V>
      • org.waarp.common.lru.SynchronizedLruCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceLruCache<K,V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SoftReferenceSynchronizedLruCache

    public class SynchronizedLruCache<K,V>
extends AbstractLruCache<K,V>
    Threadsafe synchronized implementation of LruCache based on LinkedHashMap. Threadsafety is provided by method synchronization.

    This cache implementation should be used with low number of threads.

    Author:
    Damian Momot
